channel.title: Tops on Jordon's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Jordon's Blog

item.description: Jorodn Li is passionate about open source, Java, C #, .NetCore and Web. He also has strong interests in various tech stuff such as Artificial Intelligence, Cryptocurrencies, Smart Home. Jorodn holds a BS in Network Engineering from SuZhou University in China. He is happy with his current job, but also willing to take new challenges if the opportunity matches his career path. While he is not working, he enjoys watching movies, swimming, hiking, travelling, writing blogs and learning languages.
